name: LA COLADA
title: (43850) LA COLADA
description: Laundromat + tumble dryer (Lavenderia). Very clean, washes very well and the laundry smells good. There is a machine for making change.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 29 Carrer Camí de Sant Joan
title_short: (43850) Cambrils - 29 Carrer Camí de Sant Joan
description: Free parking space. Across from Aldi. Day and night parking...

title: (43850) Cambrils - 25D Carrer Xalet del Bau
description: Free parking, without height limit. relatively close to the center / port of Cambrils. There is a symbol of not staying overnight.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 26 Carrer de Foix
description: Fantastic overnight stop down the side road very very quite close to the local amenities restaurants and a short walk to the beach restaurants in this area are fantastic and the old city is just a few metres away to explore a very enjoyable place to be

title: (43850) Cambrils - 1 Carrer del Garbí
description: It is a street between blocks, with parking to spend the day and night ... c / Garbí

title: (43850) Cambrils - 16 Avinguda de la Llosa
description: Carrer Mestral. Self service laundry with washers and dryers. Fast and economical, with detergent included. It has machine for changing tickets to mines

title: (43850) Cambrils - 12 Carrer Xalet del Bau
description: Mestral parking, free. Near the beach and the center of Cambrils

title: (43850) Cambrils - 12 Carrer Sant Jaume
description: Ground parking without services, quiet place with the beach at 5 'and a dog beach nearby too.

title: (43850) Cambrils - Avinguda Horta de Santa Maria
title_short: (43850) Cambrils - Avinguda Horta de Santa Maria
description: You can park the motorhome and the local police allow it, it is the promenade of Cambrils, in the same town, you have all the services that the town offers, you are on the same beach.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 6 Carrer Sant Jaume
description: Good place to sleep and spend the day near the center and the beach. No problem.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 24 Carrer Venus
description: This cul-de-sac is flat and quiet. Soon you have the beach. We have been there and there were several here

title: (43850) Cambrils - 29 Avinguda Adelaida
description: Superb location spot for old town as you head away from the pictured Motorhome turn right and then you will see the entrance to the old town it is not very well signposted despite this ideal to spend the night and then explore the town which is well worth looking at the road is very quiet with the river now dried up to the left hand side no trouble with any residents or cars late at night a very picturesque little spot

name: Camping Capfun Mirmanda
title: (43391) Camping Capfun Mirmanda
description: Campsite of the French chain CapFun. Large swimming pool and lawn. Fun on the slides for all ages. Plots with little shade and little privacy from each other but spacious, with electricity and water. Gray and black casting. Animation at 10. Team of lifeguards all super attentive, since the campsite is so big, there are a lot of people in high season. Supermarket inside the campsite expensive, but there are several around. Spacious and comfortable bathrooms. Washer, Dryer, Pool Bar Fair prices although I can't say what the quality is. Your children will make friends yes or yes, there are many of all ages.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 1 Carrer Jaume Ferran
description: Free parking without supervision. do not look like it's not clean but for a stopover it's pretty handy. shops and laundromat 5 minutes walk (follow the bike path at the exit of the parking on the left and the second street on the left), bike path to the sea and the tourist center. We stayed one night in high season. quieter than the center parking at 2 euros.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 7 Carrer Estel
description: Quiet parking right in front of the sea. Under Camping La Llosa. Very quiet and bright place!

title: (43850) Cambrils - 2 Carrer Luis de Góngora
description: Picnic area with tables and benches, in the shade of pine trees. In front of the sea

name: Camping La Llosa | Camping Cambrils
title: (43850) Camping La Llosa | Camping Cambrils
description: Cambrils, 18 Carrer Camí de les Lloses. Camping la llosa standard plots quite small but shaded, mini club, swimming pool, bar, supermarket ... Beach 100 m, bike path to Cambrils not even 10 minutes. Good value because well located.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 41 Avinguda de la Diputació
description: Paid parking for eating, sea view, cycle path. Convenient for a few hours

name: Camping Platja Cambrils
title: (43850) Camping Platja Cambrils
description:
Platja Cambrils
Long welcome because many people on arrival
Don't be fooled: 7.2/7.4 motorhomes fit on standard pitches, just pb of branches that are still too low, you can't always settle in correctly...
Noisy on weekend evenings because the regulars meet there but the people are friendly
Very well located: near the beach, walks, Cambrils, Salou...
You can take a bus to PortAventura

title: (43850) Cambrils - 43 Avinguda de la Diputació
description: Parking all day and free nights. Located in front of the beach with a shower and a snack bar to eat or drink something, with late opening but not annoying, we spent two nights without problems (no service) to visit Cambrils, there is a bus located at 20 meters.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 29 Carrer Llobregat
description: Parking on the coast of the beach and near the center of Cambrils. I imagine that in high season it will be full... or it could be prohibitive, I don't know

title: (43850) Cambrils - 2 Carrer Gaià
description: Pine Grove in a parking lot, near the beach, in season a lot of cars, but acceptable. Super Spar 300m to 1.5 from the port of Cambrils.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 14 Carrer Francolí
description: Very quiet parking and 5 minutes walk from the beach. There are some trees for shade. I slept one night and no problem...

title: (43850) Cambrils - 18 Carrer Riu Brugent
description: No they’re rather sites that are offered on park4night in the local facility this road is very quiet it comes of a sub road and then this road is off that so there is no traffic coming up it at night time hundred metres from the beach we had a good nights sleep there is a slight camber on the road other than that it is flat we sleep across the van so with our heads on the curbside it was perfect nice walks along the promenade and you can rent sailing boats A short distance away quarter of a mile to walk to the local marina with plenty of coffee shops and eating establishments on the way the promenade is really nice Showers and toilets on the beach and the water is crystal clear there is also a designated cycle track along the promenade

title: (43850) Cambrils - 20 Carrer del Camí del Corralet
title_short: (43850) Cambrils - 20 Carrer del Camí del Corralet
description: Parking lot style.Tranquille 100 m from the beach for now (August 2016) not paid we stayed 3 days, discreet without leaving table etc. Think of other motorhomes who want to come back do not let anything drag. No service.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 2 Carrer de Montbrió
description: Service station (LPG) with parking and other large parking area/rest for large vehicles. We didn’t stay here overnight but other vans had, filled water tank, showers  WC in the station with restaurant.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 20 Carrer Vitòria
description: Quiet area 1 minute from the beach you can spend the night without problem

title: (43850) Cambrils - 23 Carrer de Josep Lluís Sert
title_short: (43850) Cambrils - 23 Carrer de Josep Lluís Sert
description: VERY GOOD location, also 2 parallel street there is an area with many battery parking areas. By the sea.

name: Camping Joan Bungalow Park
title: (43850) Camping Joan Bungalow Park
description: Family campsite next to the beach. Possibility to empty without parking at night. Very friendly welcome. Small but with everything you need. including animation. Perfect for children. With direct access to the beach.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 3 Carrer Celia Forester
description: Awesome little parking right next to the beach, very quiet at night perfect for swimming. Small parking and small access, van and campers bigger than 5.5m won't really fit.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 30 Avinguda Mussara
description: Long and very quiet street (Avda Mussara) right next to a large park with several playgrounds and basketball court, as well as well-shaded trees for an impromptu picnic. Ideal area for children and pets. There is plenty of space to park in line, in the middle of August it was almost empty. Residential area with houses with gardens. Garbage containers and bins nearby.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 100 Passeig Marítim
description: Small drinking fountain and showers nearby the beach, all free to use, there is a parking for few cars very close on side of the road

title: (43850) Cambrils - 7 Carrer Autovia A7 Sortida 1148
description: Terrestrial parking next to a hotel where you can eat quite well and at good prices. The hotel can be booked at the same time you have access to the hotel swimming pool. There are no signs prohibiting overnight stays or prohibited air conditioning.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 51C Avinguda Mas De'n Clariana
description: A dirt/sandy parkingterrain with shade near a school, less than 1km to the beach. it can be a bit muddy in the winter. Really crowded around 8.30/9 am because locals are bringing their kids to school. it's a great place to spend the night (in the off season) very quiet at night and no signs that parking a camper is not allowed. supermarket across the road.

name: Camping La Corona ***
title: (43850) Camping La Corona ***
description: Swimming pool, sports area, supermarket, restaurant, laundry, playgrounds, sinks, barbecue, showers and chemical toilets. The hostess is very welcoming and speaks a little French. Wifi 30 min free around the swimming pool.

title: (43850) Cambrils - 175 Avinguda de la Diputació
description: Laundry Clean Wash. You can take the soap you use normally. No need to carry coins, they accept bank cards. In summer months it is difficult to park, but today in September, there is plenty of parking around.

title: (43391) Vinyols i els Arcs -
description: Search by coordinates. Highway T-314 entrance km 1. Parking area to be able to spend the night, completely fenced. And with surveillance. Access to electricity and water. Full sink with shower. Washing machine and sink for dishes. Shade. Reservations by phone. Motorhome, caravans and campervans.

name: Camping & Resort Sangulí Salou
title: (43840) Camping & Resort Sangulí Salou
description: Camping Resort Sanguli is a particularly beautiful, large and busy mixed camping/camper site. This is a real family campsite where there is plenty to do, including for the kids. The campsite may not be really cheap but really super cozy. You have to like crowds and commotion because it is always busy as long as the campsite is open, there are also many Dutch people, the reception also speaks Dutch, but all kinds of nationalities are also present. It is a huge park with 1300 places! There are 4 pools which all have different items. The campsite is 100 meters from the beach. Everything is included and there are several places where you can stand. The pitches can be 50 to 70 mtr, but also large comfort pitches with supply and drainage of water and electricity (16 amp) on your own site, which are then 100 to 140 mtr. Those are therefore more expensive. Also a perfect free WIFI on every lot. Despite there are many trees for the necessary shade, there is an excellent satellite reception in most places due to the placement of the trees.

name: Camping Ecocamp
title: (43391) Camping Ecocamp
description: Camping on the farm, ideal for children and families.

title: (43391) Vinyols i els Arcs - 22 Avinguda de Catalunya
title_short: (43391) Vinyols i els Arcs - 22 Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Public parking, very large for ac, quiet place near Salou and Cambrils ideal to see Parc Sama,

title: (43892) Mont-roig del Camp - 47 Partida Poblas
description: Place that should have been in the past (or was going to be and was not completed) camping or motorhome area but that was abandoned. There is no service and the grass has grown a bit, but there are no visible billboards or no-parking signs. It is next to a road but it is not very busy. The beach is not very far and you can walk.

title: (43840) Salou - 6 Carrer B
description: Ample free parking near the beach. but not to sleep

name: Cambrils
title: (43892) Cambrils
description: Good campsite with direct access to the beach.

title: (43840) Salou - 7 Carrer de Santiago Ramón Y Cajal
title_short: (43840) Salou - 7 Carrer de Santiago Ramón Y Cajal
description: Parking at the side of the road in the marked parking lane. You don't take anyone's parking space away like elsewhere in Salou. Next door is a shell that will probably be completed. Another camper also parked here. 15 minutes walk to the beach, a few minutes to Lidl. No camping behavior please!

address.street: 7 Carrer de Santiago Ramón Y Cajal

title: (43840) Salou - 18 Carrer de Domènec Sugrañes i Gras
title_short: (43840) Salou - 18 Carrer de Domènec Sugrañes i Gras
description: In calm residence. for day and night. near lidl and 10 mins by cc from PortAventura.

address.street: 18 Carrer de Domènec Sugrañes i Gras

title: (43840) Salou - 2 Carrer Alexander Fleming
description: Lidl parking. We stayed here for one night without a problem but noisy as next to a main road. By cons very convenient because 5 minutes from the beach by bike by the bike path at the bottom of the car park. For the 2nd night we just went to the parallel street which was definitely quieter and safe. The nearest petrol station is the cheapest: 0.99 liters of diesel

title: (43840) Salou - Carrer de Lluís Domènech I Montaner
title_short: (43840) Salou - Carrer de Lluís Domènech I Montaner
description: Parking for the night, in subdivision ever built, quiet enough. Passersby walk their dogs at night. Some runners and walkers but not noisy. lidl just nearby

address.street: Carrer de Lluís Domènech I Montaner

title: (43892) Mont-roig del Camp - 76 Partida Poblas
description: Manual laundry for motorhomes with walkway.

title: (43840) Salou - 19 Extrarradio Poligon 33
description: Small natural corner in a dead end, at the end of a path lined with olive groves! Calm, noise of cicadas at night and ducks during the day!

title: (43840) Salou - 14 Passeig de Miramar
description: Parked in roadside parallel parking opposite the beach. This is paid meter parking during the day, but we arrived at 7pm and left at 9am. Beach showers and toilets every 100m along the beach. Perfect for an evening swim and morning dip! Negatives: Street lights are bright and some traffic noise  if you are a light sleeper.

title: (43840) Salou - 25 Carrer de València
description: Street without blue zone to park near the beach of Salou. Only for low season.

title: (43840) Salou - 5 Passeig de Jaume I
description: Small drinking fountain

name: Camping Playa y Fiesta
title: (43892) Camping Playa y Fiesta
description: Welcome to Camping Playa y Fiesta, an ideal starting point to spend unforgettable holidays with family or friends, and enjoy a unique region that will not leave you indifferent. The Costa Dorada offers endless possibilities that guarantee everyone's enjoyment: beach, culture, tradition, sport, fun. We are convinced that you will fall in love!

title: (43840) Salou - 7 Passeig del 30 d'Octubre
description: Very little busy street next to a park and in front of an institute. At the end of August we parked to sleep without problems. During the school year I don't know how it will be. There is a market on Mondays and you cannot park. We slept a perfect night

title: (43840) Salou - 27 Carrer de Berlín
description: Parking with parking meters in summer season and Easter, Rest of the year, free. Next to the campsite La Siesta. 300 meters from the beach.

title: (43840) Salou - 7 Passeig del 30 d'Octubre
description:
Large car park without apparent prohibition. We didn't sleep there but certainly possible.
Convenient for going to the beach or visiting Salou.


Closed on monday from 00h to 18h due to local market

title: (43840) Salou - Km 1 Autovia de Salou a Reus
title_short: (43840) Salou - Km 1 Autovia de Salou a Reus
description: Shell station possibility to put water for free at the inflation terminal

address.street: Km 1 Autovia de Salou a Reus

title: (43480) Vila-seca - 4248 Diseminado Formiga
description: Small space of land between 2 small country roads. Fairly quiet in front of olive trees. No sign indicating that we cannot rest at night here. A bit of traffic on the roads, but we spent a night here, quietly. Good alternative for tarragona and port aventura! Keep it clean please! ?

title: (43840) Salou - 44 Extrarradio Poligon 27
description: Ample ground parking. In summer the surrounding parking lots are full of cars and this is a esplanade that is enabled for vehicle parking. Today there is no prohibition sign for motorhomes, and you can spend the night peacefully.

name: La Siesta Salou Resort & Camping
title: (43840) La Siesta Salou Resort & Camping
description: Shaded campsite with pool 200 m from the beach and 900 m from Port Aventura. Clean sanitary facilities.  Very good stay. New in June 2023 is a tropical water pools a facility’s inc spa. Well maintained park with plenty to do.

title: (43840) Salou - 2 Avinguda de Joan Fuster
description: New car park, loads of spaces even when rest of town was full. Parked here while exploring town nightlife and stayed the night, was quiet, felt pretty safe and we rested well. No height restrictions or other restrictions.

title: (43840) Salou - 3 Avinguda de Salvador Vilaseca
description: Parking at the entrance of Salou. Ideal for visiting the city.You have 1.9 km to the center

title: (43480) - 1151 Carretera Cambrils
description: To sleep quite calm. There is a restaurant, gas station and hotel bar. 2 minutes from Salou and Port Aventura.

name: El Rancho Wakepark
title: (43330) El Rancho Wakepark
description: El Rancho Wakepark is a water ski center, located in Riudoms, Tarragona. We have a privileged environment in the middle of nature, where you can spend a day with your family, either enjoying our main activity, which is Wakeboarding, or enjoying our swimming pools, children's play area and of course our foodtruck, with the best burgers and tapas from the area. We have a bar service and toilets, open from 9 a.m. to 11 p.m., and the shower is outside. 15 minutes from Salou, Tarragona, Cambrils... and many more interesting coastal points. And 15 minutes also from a mountain area where you can practice all kinds of outdoor activities, climbing, hiking, etc...

name: Camping els Prats
title: (43300) Camping els Prats
description: 3 star campsite, shaded. Nice benefits. with a pool. (along the beach). Very nice sanitary facilities. Supermarket and restaurant on the campsite.

title: (43330) Riudoms - 21 Camí de Riudoms a Tarragona
title_short: (43330) Riudoms - 21 Camí de Riudoms a Tarragona
description: Scale for vehicle weighing act for motorhomes.

title: (43840) Salou - Calle Josep Pla
description: Josep Pla street, we spent the night quiet and close to Port Aventura. It's fine for one night, it's a street where you can park without a problem

title: (43330) Riudoms - 15 Passeig Germans Nebot
description: Battery parking between trees. Industrial area at the entrance to Riudoms. Benzine Darrera. Traffic of vehicles but it is not noisy. Bar Restaurant on the coast and 5 minutes walk from the center of town.

title: (43840) Salou - 21 Autovia de Tarragona a Salou
title_short: (43840) Salou - 21 Autovia de Tarragona a Salou
description: Security parking without any service

title: (43330) Riudoms - 3 Camí del Boch
description: Quiet, sandy parking right at the entrance of the village. Free, without services and illuminated at night. The local police recommended us this space.

title: (43840) Salou - Avinguda del Batlle Pere Molas
title_short: (43840) Salou - Avinguda del Batlle Pere Molas
description: Free street parking next to the entrance of PortAventura. This parking is empty during night (after 20h and before park opening), quiet road during night. We slept there for 2 nights and left car for 2 days while being in PortAventura. Road is quiet during night. We preferred this place to Decathlon parking.

title: (43840) Salou - 31 Avinguda de Pompeu Fabra
description: Parking for the day, 9 spacious campsites. Free from September. Only prohibited for caravans.

title: (43840) Salou - 2 Carrer de Josep Pla
description: A very quiet and very close place to spend the night before entering the adventure.

title: (43840) Vila-seca - s/n Carrer Salvador Espriu
description: Online parking, urban, in front of a school, close to the Mossos police station and very close to Port Aventura, a quiet place with little traffic, we stayed one night.

name: Camping & Resort La Torre del Sol
title: (43892) Camping & Resort La Torre del Sol
title_short: (43892) Camping & Resort La Torre del Sol
description: Camping La Torre del Sol. Direct access to the beach, entertainment and good pools

title: (43330) Riudoms - 10 Carrer de Joan Miró
description: Drinking fountain in the park

title: (43840) Salou - 263 Carrer de Torremolinos
description: Good parking day, a few steps from the center of Salou. To pay only in summer period.

title: (43840) Salou - 2 Carrer Mercè Rodoreda
description: Carrer Merce Rodoreda, a nearby place after being in Port Aventura to spend the night and continue your route, we have a Mercadona nearby

title: (43330) Riudoms - 7 Avinguda Catalunya
description: Parking (empty), quiet. Close to shopping area (bakery, bars, supermarkets). Nice views towards the mountain 'La Musarra'.

title: (43300) Mont-roig del Camp - 7 Carrer d'Aureli Escarré
title_short: (43300) Mont-roig del Camp - 7 Carrer d'Aureli Escarré
description: Quite flat parking but during the week a lot of noise due to the institute

name: PortAventura Parking Caravaning
title: (43480) PortAventura Parking Caravaning
description: Great parking to do PortAventura Park. Safe places, free services. Only for park customers. Maximum two nights, possibility of a 3rd night on request at reception (if available). It includes the following services: taps for drinking water, drainage for gray or black water, showers, sinks and electricity points. Possible access to the hotel pool. Parking Caravaning is a package that includes parking nights plus tickets for the parks. The package cannot be separated.

title: (43480) Vila-seca - 39 Carrer de Monterols
description: Spacious and quiet dirt car park

title: (43480) Vila-seca - 9 Avinguda de l'Alcalde Pere Molas
title_short: (43480) Vila-seca - 9 Avinguda de l'Alcalde Pere Molas
description: Self-service laundry with easy parking in the area. There is an Aldi and a Lidl nearby.

title: (43300) Mont-roig del Camp - 2 Carretera Colldejou
description: Excellent and clean laundry. You can pay with a debit/credit card, they also use ecological micro-encapsulated soap that lasts for several days. It has a vending machine. You can park in front of the town hall for free. On the corner there is a wonderful cafeteria with spectacular sandwiches only in the morning in winter, and on the same street there are supermarkets Día and Spar. Village with local products: fruit/vegetables and olive oil. Gem of a place. Dolors, her owner is super friendly.

title: (43480) Vila-seca - 64 Avinguda de la Generalitat
description: Public dirt and grass parking, fairly well leveled. No length limit. Located in a small, quiet town with all services and very close to Port Aventura, Salou, etc. for cycling

name: Playa Montroig Camping Resort
title: (43892) Playa Montroig Camping Resort
description: Playa Montroig Camping Resort, 63 Partida Prats. Camping seaside, friendly with children's activities

title: (43840) Salou - 7 Carrer de les Dunes
description: Good parking to go to the beach. It's on the earring. I don't know if the night can be borrowed but there is no sign that directly prohibits it.

title: (43205) Reus - 1V Plaça Joan Ferrete I Soler
title_short: (43205) Reus - 1V Plaça Joan Ferrete I Soler
description: Picnic tables and benches south of the city of Reus. Consum supermarket 50 meters away.

title: (43206) Reus - 1 T-310
description: At BonÀrea gas station, 4 sleeping places, discharge of gray and black water, you can fill the water tank. They have self-service laundry (washing machine and dryer) There is a supermarket for shopping, cafeteria and a restaurant La Braseria. The cheapest fuel price. There is also a car wash for caravans - 4 minutes. Vacuum cleaner -8 minutes.

title: (43840) Salou - 25 Extrarradio Crt
description: Parking on the side of the road.

title: (43840) Salou - 35 Carrer de la Cala de la Font
title_short: (43840) Salou - 35 Carrer de la Cala de la Font
description: Welcoming van parking space with view of the Cap de Salou. Negative point: sloping and a lot of dog poop. You can park along the bushes at the bottom of the parking lot which is not sloping. Quiet area, the police came by several times and didn't tell us anything.

address.street: 35 Carrer de la Cala de la Font

title: (43480) Vila-seca - 1 Carrer del Pas del Rei
title_short: (43480) Vila-seca - 1 Carrer del Pas del Rei
description: This quiet sidestreet is ideal for those looking to come into this area late at night just parked up safely there is no traffic around here sheltered by the trees in the summer time as well overnight there is a little an Aldi and two competing petrol stations for the cheapest in town so this will be a great support for those that just want to park overnight and rest without any inconvenience stock up with food and fuel and there is also a McDonald’s for those that wish

title: (43840) Salou - 8 Carrer de les Pedres Fogueres
title_short: (43840) Salou - 8 Carrer de les Pedres Fogueres
description: We stayed the night here to go to portAventura, room for 2 big 7 meter motorhomes or about 4 small motorhomes. Night was very quiet, little bit of trash around the place due to teenagers, but it is a free parking spot that is level so thats worth something too! The beach, bars, shops and grocery stores can be found from a 10 minute walk. No amenities.

title: (43205) Reus - 15 Carrer de Cèlia Artiga Esplugas
title_short: (43205) Reus - 15 Carrer de Cèlia Artiga Esplugas
description:
Alcampo and Mercadona supermarket next door. it is a large esplanade of land with plenty of room. It is somewhat far from the center of the city but there is much less tragic and it is more secluded to sleep more peacefully.

Note: the area seems closed and impossible to access but a lower curb in front of the school allows easy entrance

title: (43840) Salou - 9 Carrer del Donzell Marí
description: Very large car park on the sunny side and the shaded side, near restaurant, beaches, shop, hiking path. small and large motorhome no problem.

title: (43840) Salou - 10 Carrer del Pas de la Mala Dona
title_short: (43840) Salou - 10 Carrer del Pas de la Mala Dona
description:
parking spot
Nothing special, but very quiet at night!
Make sure it stays that way!
Behave yourself and don't upset the locals!
Take the rubbish with you!

address.street: 10 Carrer del Pas de la Mala Dona

title: (43480) Vila-seca - Via Màxima
description: Parking without height limit. Please note the ground is rather dirty and not flat, however it is near a McDonald's for toilets and to eat

title: (43205) Reus - 26 Avinguda de Sant Bernat Calbó
title_short: (43205) Reus - 26 Avinguda de Sant Bernat Calbó
description: Repsol petrol station with laundromat & LPG

title: (43480) Vila-seca - 603 Carrer del Castellet
description: By necessity to go to the health center we spent the night there and slept very well. Max. Length 6 to 7 m

title: (43840) Salou - 12 Carrer de la Mola d'Aires
title_short: (43840) Salou - 12 Carrer de la Mola d'Aires
description: Located opposite a playground, flat parking, sea 2 minutes away. perfect for one night

title: (43840) Salou - 4 Carrer Lledoner
description: One of the only car parks that I could find without prohibition to motor coach, next to a basketball court

title: (43840) Salou - 6 Carrer de la Cala Crancs
title_short: (43840) Salou - 6 Carrer de la Cala Crancs
description: Not in a residential area it’s very quiet there are plenty of spaces in the one shown where my motorhome is perfectly flat no problem with the police everything minutes walk to a nice sandy beach and they have Shaz on the beach as well excellent place to stay we were here in July 2021

title: (43840) - 5E Extrarradio Crt
description: Quiet parking flat good for a break or a night if everything is complete around next to the golf for amateurs

title: (43840) Salou - 10 Carrer de la Mola d'Aires
title_short: (43840) Salou - 10 Carrer de la Mola d'Aires
description: Simple but convenient parking. a little sloping, overlooks the sea. calm. the police passed several times and said nothing.

title: (43772) Botarell - 19 Camí Veïnal
description: Winged ground parking in the village, without services but very quiet. Supermarket and bar in the village.

title: (43480) Vila-seca - 17A Carrer de Vilafortuny
description: Roadside parking in an industrial area. It is safe, you will certainly be with truckers. Be careful, you can hear a driver leaving at night and in the morning a factory just next door makes noise, it's just to help out one night and leave in the morning because the rest of the car parks are full!

title: (43840) Salou - 44 Carrer de la Cala Crancs
title_short: (43840) Salou - 44 Carrer de la Cala Crancs
description: Small car park with access to the lighthouse viewpoint in Cap de Salou. Quiet place overlooking the sea. Not suitable for vehicles over 5 m

title: (43330) Riudoms - Carretera de les Borges
description:
Everyone is welcome! Krysthell and Leonardo are very warm and caring people and they invite everyone to stay as long as they want. the property is still under construction. Help is always welcome. they managed to bring the land to a comfortable place. With a hammock and a large lawn, everyone can get comfortable and be together at night by candlelight and in a good mood. two cats, two chickens, two geese, and one female dog also welcome everyone. Call/write on WhatsApp you can find our number also at the entrance.

All year open!! Also space for two caravans under roof!

title: (43481) Vila-seca - 15 Carrer del Camí del Racó
title_short: (43481) Vila-seca - 15 Carrer del Camí del Racó
description: This is the Pacha car park in Salou. but the pacha car park is free...very spacious, little noise...I guess it's open all year round. I find it incredible that no one has downloaded it yet.. hahahahaha

title: (43300) Mont-roig del Camp - T-322
description: Picnic area, with several playgrounds. Shade and rest area. Very quiet and surrounded by nature.

title: (43206) Reus - 61 Carrer del Doctor Ferran
description: Place enabled to park, a mercadona in front of the toilet is from the same mercadona. laundry right next to the main entrance, not the from the parking lot, a stone's throw from the center of Reus, buying and eating is assured, you can visit Casa Navas in Plaza Mercal.

name: Camping Miramar
title: (43892) Camping Miramar
description: Miramar campsite. Very comfortable place with plots with some shade. Accept the ACSI card. It's next to the beach.

title_short: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 49 Passeig de Pau Casals

title_short: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 30 Carrer d'Enrico Caruso

title: (43202) Reus - 8 Carrer del Doctor Frias

title: (43350) Les Borges del Camp -
description:
Spot for camper with good views and absolute tranquility in the middle of nature. Only suitable for small caravans or camper vans
Close to les Borges and Riudoms with supermarkets. 5 minutes from the beach and the mountains. Space for several vans.
Call before arriving.

title: (43840) Salou - 12 Carrer del Farallo

description: Car park. Park with water

title: (43206) Reus - 46 Carrer d'Apel·les Mestres
description: Car wash with pressurized water. One of the boxes has a platform to clean the motorhome on top.

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 2 Passeig Marítim
description: Free parking next to the beach. There is a beach bar.

name: Camping La Pineda de Salou
title: (43481) Camping La Pineda de Salou
description: Vila-seca, 280 Carretera de la Costa. Camping La Pineda Salou. Very good campsite with swimming pool, grocery store, bar and restaurant. Electricity, water, emptying, sanitary, camping equipment. Perfect and quiet, ask for a location closer to the middle and far from the road but otherwise nothing to complain about.

title: (43300) Mont-roig del Camp - T-322
description: Small turning loop surrounded by trees. Good to spend a night there. A house next door is otherwise very quiet. The only thing that was annoying was the barking of the dogs in the area

title: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 47 Carrer d'Amadeu Vives
title_short: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 47 Carrer d'Amadeu Vives
description: Esplanade of land and grass 150mts from the beach where there are shops, restaurants etc. You can spend the night without problems in the middle of July. No service for Motorhomes.

title: (43771) Riudecanyes - 57 Carrer del Dimecres
description: Land parking next to the town and a park. We parked for the day and spent a quiet night since in the villages around the sleeping places we saw them very remote and lonely and here we have felt safe and we have been well.

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 1 Carrer de Joan Oró
title_short: (43892) Miami Platja - 1 Carrer de Joan Oró
description: Parking near the beach, street without traffic. Dustbins and showers on the beach at 20 meters.

title: (43201) Reus - 3V Plaça de Morlius
description: Automatic laundry Speed Queen, next is a childrens playground with drinking water tap, some parking places around, quite near to the centre, cafes, shops. Laundry is open from 07:00- 22:00 Accepts only cash or special SpeedQueen cart.

title: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 3 Carrer de Victòria dels Àngels
title_short: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 3 Carrer de Victòria dels Àngels
description: Dead-end street that ends at the foot of the beach. Very quiet in April/May (for sure it changes in the summer season). Showers on the beach, walk...

title: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 8 Carrer de Plácido Domingo
title_short: (43481) Platja de la Pineda - 8 Carrer de Plácido Domingo
description: Superb parking, empty in low season, cafes and bars nearby7

title: (43204) Reus - 34 Carrer del Roser
description: Automatic laundry . Free wi-fi. There are no parking places nearby, you need to park further and come by foot.

title: (43771) Riudecanyes - 12 Avinguda del Parc de les Glaneres
title_short: (43771) Riudecanyes - 12 Avinguda del Parc de les Glaneres
description: Public car park in the city, not flat but quiet.

address.street: 12 Avinguda del Parc de les Glaneres

title: (43771) Riudecanyes - T-313
description: Parking under the dam of the town's swamp with good routes in nature, with toilets and even disabled people and showers, good bar for tapas and hamburgers next to the dam Quiet and familiar place, fantastic place and a very beautiful town

title: (43300) Mont-roig del Camp - 103 Partida Rocas
description: Free parking at a picnic spot. You can also park at the Ermita, but for me it's more pleasant. Several hiking and biking trails are nearby.

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 2 Carrer del Peix
description: Charming village built around multiple coves sheltered from the wind. Some with picnic tables. We spent 2 nights at 1 CC + 1 van with no problem while parking on the street. The police pass regularly, it is very secure.

title: (43204) Reus - 61C Avinguda de Marià Fortuny
description:
Large esplanade where to park and spend the night
Less than 10 minutes walk there are:
Gas station, Lidl, Carrefour, Mc Donalds, Shopping Center.
You can visit Reus (city of Gaudí) by walking

title: (43311) Vilanova d'Escornalbou - 2 Avinguda de Reus
description: Municipal parking, dirt, quite flat, without services.

title: (43892) Mont-roig del Camp - 90 Passeig Maritim
description: Quiet parking in low season with views of the cove, right next to it there are stairs to go down to the beach with showers, a little further on there is a fountain

title: (43206) Reus - 108 Passeig Nord
description: Public parking area away from the city and quiet. Supermarket nearby. North promenade of the city used as a starting point for walks and sports by the residents of the town. No shade in some areas.

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 116 Passeig Maritim
description: Water point directly on a beautiful beach.

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 21 Avinguda de Barcelona
description: The small hardware store sells or exchanges, among other things, smaller butane gas bottles (e.g. 2.75 kg) and accessories for camping stoves. Super friendly and helpful team! Fair prices.

title: (43204) Reus - 38 Carrer de la Diversitat
description: Parking without overnight prohibition, near the city center. In the polygon there are bars, mechanics, paddle, climbing wall, etc.

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 124 Passeig Maritim
description: Quiet urbanization where to spend the night. It is along the promenade so you can hear the walkers. After midnight there was a great silence, only the waves of the sea could be heard.

title: (43203) Reus - Av. de la Pau
description: Large parking lot at the cemetery. Very nice cemetery.

title: (43204) Tarragona - 6 Cami Bassa de les Cabres
title_short: (43204) Tarragona - 6 Cami Bassa de les Cabres
description: Small car park under trees at the edge of a gravel road. Quiet location next to the freeway, otherwise undisturbed. There is a large storage area for equipment on the street, but there is still nothing going on here.

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 123 Passeig del Mediterrani
description: Nice wide parking along a quiet street. it is possible to find shadow. Secluded beach is just 100 m away. Very nice spot.

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 94 Passeig del Mediterrani
description: In the Paseo, on a piece of land at the end of the street, very quiet to sleep. surrounded by pine trees, and with a supermarket 1 minute away. footbridge to go down to the coves at 1 minute. perfect to spend the night

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 5 Passeig del Mediterrani
description: Parking in a quiet area, with access to a small cove down some stairs.

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 128 Passeig del Mediterrani
description: Parking on the Paseo Marítimo. very calm. 1 min from the coves

title: (43892) Miami Playa - 16 Avinguda Califòrnia
description: Self-service laundry

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 44 Avinguda Veracruz
description: Parc de les Oliveres Miami beach picnic area. quiet place with water tap, tables and playground

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 10B Carrer de la Baixada Platja Cristall
title_short: (43892) Miami Platja - 10B Carrer de la Baixada Platja Cristall
description: Nice quiet parking space for a playground, boulevard and beach. showers available on the beach.

address.street: 10B Carrer de la Baixada Platja Cristall

title: (43892) Miami Platja - 1 Carrer Vall d'Aran
description: Car parks with large squares a few meters from the beach promenade. There are recycling bins. Playground on the beach promenade, litter bins, showers and public toilets open in high season. Tranquillity

title: (43320) Pratdip - 8 Partida les Sorts
description: Sleep peacefully in the middle of nature. Flat terrain in pebbles This CP is located 15 minutes from the AP-7 Ideal for campervans or mobile homes up to 7 meters (max 2 nights). No caravans. Privately owned so call ahead - use these coordinates: 41.035988 0.901845 follow the private gravel road to the last house, sign in there. Owners speak Dutch. Fr. English. Spanish. Visit the website for useful information and more explanation because they have 2 sites: CP VLS and CP RUST. Google on vacation rental VLS

title: (43771) Riudecanyes - TP-3211
description: CASTELL ESCORNALBOU: Superb place of natural and historical interest. Take advantage of the hiking trails and visit the museum of the Castle Escornalbou monastery which was the limit of Christianity in times of Catalan reconquest.

title: (43892) Mont-roig del Camp - 1 Carrer Ponent
description: Nice parking lot with sea view. Longitudinal parking possible. You can also park in the adjacent streets. Very quiet. If you park incorrectly across several parking spaces, the police will ask you to leave. Beautiful beach with fine sand. dogsbeach. Unfortunately, some campers always overdo it!

title: (43320) Pratdip - 18 Partida les Sorts
description:
Safe overnight stay on private property of holiday home 'Villa Les Sorts'. Very quiet area in the Nature Reserve. When holiday home-VLS is not rented, up to max. 5 mobile homes are welcome here. (Max 4 nights) Call in advance, if no answer, leave your details, they will get back to you quickly.
Google: holiday home-VLS and click on the Camper pitches tab for useful information and all explanations. The owners are hospitable, helpful and speak NL FR EN and Spanish. Belgians with a ❤️ for campers. Free use of the swimming pool, outdoor shower, outdoor bar, sun loungers, sofa… 1 sani column. 1 bathroom. Dogs welcome. Completely fenced. Keep it clean. Respect for owners of a holiday home who allow campers on their domain !!

title: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 21 Carrer dels Rosers
title_short: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 21 Carrer dels Rosers
description: The dirt parking lot having closed, we parked 2 days in the street in front of the parking lot, without any worries. Be careful not to park in the one-way part, the buses pass with difficulty. My location describes street parking, the parking lot has a height bar.

title: (43773) Duesaigües - T-313
description: Small picnic area, ideal for vans not too large, ideal for a night.

title: (43892) Miami Platja -
description: Super clean and convenient laundromat in the gas station. LPG etc ...

title: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 5 Carrer de Cesar Gimeno
title_short: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 5 Carrer de Cesar Gimeno
description: Chargeable from 15.06 - 15.09! FORBIDDEN on Sundays from 06:00 - 18:00 because of the market. Parking space directly at the port, you are in 5 minutes on the beach and in the city. Had a quiet night here.

title: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 18 Carrer de Genessies
title_short: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 18 Carrer de Genessies
description: Quiet, large car park with some very shady spots under large pine trees. Free and no prohibition signs.

title: (43892) Miami Platja -
description: Parking space between rosemary, thyme and olives on a private finca. You can find us on the C44 towards Vandellos. Behind the parking bay at an angle to the left with the flag raised. Call briefly so that we can receive and greet you.

title: (43381) L'Aleixar - 43 T-704
description: Several drinking water fountains in the village and a waste / black water dump station with a tap for rinsing.

title: (43310) Colldejou - 13 T-322
description: Asphalt parking with good views, lit with streetlights all night. Quiet although on weekend mornings it gets quite crowded.

title: (43773) L'Argentera - 1 Carrer de Reus
description: Municipal parking, bonus per track of formigó and parking in two levels of terra practically plans. L'inferiror is bigger. Sense serveis except for a trash can at the information point of the parking entrance. Sortida point of various routes like the Bosc de les Bruixes on the track to the Natura Local app

title: (43004) Tarragona - 10 Carrer Méndez Núñez
description: Day parking

title: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 79 Carretera València-H
description: Public tap, ok with jerican.

title: (43006) Tarragona - 5 Urbanització Riu Clar
description: An easily accessible fountain in a park near the highway.

title: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 67 Carrer Via Augusta
title_short: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 67 Carrer Via Augusta
description: Fairly large parking lot near the beach without service. A little shade with the trees along the paths. Calm neighborhood. I do not know if there is the possibility of spending the night there, however.

title: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - Carrer de la Sinia
title_short: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - Carrer de la Sinia
description: Parking on the street. Close to the sea, but there are definitely more beautiful places.

title: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 7 Carrer d'Hifrensa
description: Municipal swimming pool parking 1km from the beach, shaded, quiet

title: (43381) L'Aleixar - 1 T-704
description: Parking next to a church with about 8 seats. The environment has banks. Somewhat narrow access road and some branches.

title: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 12 Camí Número 12
description: Wide, flat place, next to the beach. It is a blue zone during the day but from 8:00 p.m. to 10:00 a.m. the next day, it is free.

title: (43390) Les Irles - N-420
description: Nice place along the road in the green.

title: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - 68 Carretera Valencia-H
description: Parking place a few 100m from the beach. Parked here for the night. It’s the start of a dog walking path, so there are some people walking by, making it also a place where people keep an eye out. Fine for a night when on route or leaving early for the beach.

title: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - Passeig de l'Arenal
title_short: (43890) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - Passeig de l'Arenal
description:
Really nice parking ... right on the beachfront, in front of the apartments at the edge of town ... sheltered from traffic and train noise ... very quiet at night
Beachfront showers and a water fountain in front of the restaurant close by

title: (43890) Tarragona - 47 N-340
description: Water for free

title: (43006) Tarragona - T-721
description: Paid parking per day 9am-8pm, free Saturday and Sunday. Probably fine over night as no signs prohibiting.

title: (43005) Tarragona - 7 Prolongació Passeig Independència
description: Public fountain next to the regulated parking area. In this area, for one euro you can park all day and take advantage of it and get water

title: (43320) Pratdip - T-310
description: Parking on the side of the road 5 minutes walk from the entrance to the city.  Useful as there aren't many places to park.

title: (43120) Constantí - 32 Carrer Mossèn Ramon Bergadà
description: Free parking to spend the day, I highly recommend it next to nature

title: (43005) Tarragona - 18 Passeig de la Independència
description: Municipal parking lot convenient for parking and going to town or shopping nearby. However this car park is not for large vehicles such as motorhomes but rather for converted vans. Day parking.

title: (43120) Constantí - 2X Carrer Major
description: A nice park to spend the day and night

name: Àrea d'autocaravanes de l'Hospitalet de l'Infant
title: (43890) Àrea d'autocaravanes de l'Hospitalet de l'Infant
title_short: (43890) Àrea d'autocaravanes de l'Hospitalet de l'Infant
description: Nice place, very quiet at night. The land is sloping. The maximum parking time is 48 hours.

title: (43005) Tarragona - 29 Carrer Josep M Terrasa
description: Parking managed by a social project. Inserted in a park with shaded parking, games for children, fountains and kiosk.

title: (43006) Tarragona - 6 Carrer del Francolí
description: 12 picnic tables

title: (43005) Tarragona - 2 Carrer de Guillem Oliver
description: Dead end street, very quiet and with police nearby. It has the ideal francoli park nearby to walk the dog and 15 minutes walk from the center of tarragona.

title: (43320) Pratdip - 29 T-310
description: ParKing right next to the city. Quite calm and with good views

title: (43005) Tarragona - 15 Carrer de Francesc Bastos
description: Covered and guarded parking, ideal for parking with a small van (height limit 2.1m) and going to visit the city.

title: (43890) Tarragona - 14 Carrer de Cadaloques
description: Parking

title: (43004) Tarragona - b4 Moll de Llevant
description: Facing the sea, next to the port. 12 places to park. In principle there are no prohibitions to spend the night with a van. We have asked the Port and they have not prevented us. Quiet place, although before 00:00 there is a lot of movement along the walk.

title: (43890) Tarragona - 6 Carrer de Cadaloques
description: Parking in front of houses and in front of the beach. Barrier at the entrance Max 2m. The guarde came in the morning to ask us not to camp. Paillote open in season. Showers on the beach. Parking more or less flat and quite clean.

title: (43004) Tarragona - Moll de Llevant
description: Parking at the port. Small vehicles only

name: Camping Cala d'Oques
title: (43890) Camping Cala d'Oques
description: Campsite right on the beach with sunny and shady pitches. Pebble-sand beach. Terraced, undivided. Cash payment required. Supply and disposal for large vehicles only possible to a limited extent: No faecal disposal for vehicles with a faecal tank. Gray water disposal only possible with a hose.

title: (43891) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - Camí del Racó del Marfull a la Porrassa
title_short: (43891) L'Hospitalet de l'Infant - Camí del Racó del Marfull a la Porrassa
description: Autogrill, with showers and toilets. Rasthof restaurant, as well as a small shop with it.

address.street: Camí del Racó del Marfull a la Porrassa

title: (43002) Tarragona - Av. Catalunya
description: New and fast laundromat. There are only 3 washing units (9,14,19kg) and two big 17kg dryers. Washing is 30min and drying 20min with increments of 5min/1euro but it's no need if you select hot air. Payment by card or coins accepted. I paid 14 euros for wash&dry 15kg laundary, all done in 30 25min.

title: (43120) Constantí - 1 Cami l'Almoster
description: Parking site of the Villa Romana de Centcelles located 2 km from the city. No service.
